authentication
Class Authenticator

java.lang.Object
  authentication.AbstractAuthenticator
      authentication.Authenticator
public class Authenticator
extends AbstractAuthenticator

Basic session authenticator. This class is supposed to be used together with the user model supplied with the Re-Mote database scripts.
